description:
Presented by:

- Olivier Louvignes (https://twitter.com/olouv)
- Julien Bouquillon (https://twitter.com/revolunet)
- Douglas Duteil (https://twitter.com/douglasduteil)

github repo: https://github.com/angular-widgets/ng-factory

Because a generator is not enough, here comes the ngFactory made for making your Angular component developer life easier. Its goal is to :
- synchronize dev workflows, 
- generate basic component documentation,
- take care of the publishing steps
title: ngFactory: the Angular component development environment at ng-europe 2014
